    • 方法详细资料

      • requestPermission

        public static void requestPermission(android.app.Activity activity,
                                     int requestCode,
                                     PermissionUtils.PermissionGrant permissionGrant)
        Requests permission.
        参数:
        activity -
        requestCode - request code, e.g. if you need request CAMERA permission,parameters is PermissionUtils.CODE_CAMERA

      • requestMultiResult

        private static void requestMultiResult(android.app.Activity activity,
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                       int[] grantResults,
                                       PermissionUtils.PermissionGrant permissionGrant)

      • requestMultiPermissions

        public static void requestMultiPermissions(android.app.Activity activity,
                                           PermissionUtils.PermissionGrant grant)
        一次申请多个权限

                                        int requestCode,
                                        java.lang.String requestPermission)

                                        android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener okListener)

      • requestPermissionsResult

        public static void requestPermissionsResult(android.app.Activity activity,
                                            int requestCode,
                                            @NonNull
                                            java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                            @NonNull
                                            int[] grantResults,
                                            PermissionUtils.PermissionGrant permissionGrant)
        参数:
        activity -
        requestCode - Need consistent with requestPermission
        permissions -
        grantResults -

      • openSettingActivity

        private static void openSettingActivity(android.app.Activity activity,

      • getNoGrantedPermission

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getNoGrantedPermission(android.app.Activity activity,
                                                                           boolean isShouldRationale)
        参数:
        activity -
        isShouldRationale - true: return no granted and shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale permissions, false:return no granted and !shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale
        返回:
